title: What to Watch: ‘Pam & Tommy,’ Plus Three More Things to Stream This Week
sub_head: ‘Reacher’ comes to Prime Video; yet another star-studded comedy murder mystery, ‘Murderville,’ comes to Netflix and how to watch the Olympics
body:
Pamela Anderson and Tommy Lee’s sex tape saga is a Hulu series, and Jack Reacher is a lot bigger than Tom Cruise in Prime Video’s “Reacher.” Plus, Peacock may have figured out how to make it easy for you to watch the Winter Olympics. Here’s where to stream it all:
(Hulu)
